title: Do you like my fanfic so far?
content:
I think my story is okay so far... it's not bad, but it isn't really good either, it's just okay. Do you like my fanfic so far?[img]http://www.classicgaming.com/cc314/msgboard/emotikeen-confused.gif[/img] Signed, Harvey Smith

title: Re: Do you like my fanfic so far?
content:
It is more like something a piolate fills out as he goes from place to place, so he can keep track of where he went that day.

Um... why do people keep becoming animals.

Why does Keen fly to so many random planets?

[img]http://www.classicgaming.com/cc314/msgboard/emotikeen-yawn.gif[/img] So far, a bit boring.Proud Leader of the "Tough Guys Wear Pink" Society

title: Re: Do you like my fanfic so far?
content:
Its an improvement, but you just haven't gotten the hang of keeping someone in one place and time long enough to make sense. You need to write longer and more descriptively, and pleas actually rea this comment instead of ignoring it.A proud member of the Spleen Extinction society

content:

title: Re: Do you like my fanfic so far?
content:

title: Re: Do you like my fanfic so far?
content:
[quote]Quote:[hr] I try, but I'm not good at coming up with my own planets....[hr][/quote]
Then I'd think it would be a lot simpler if you just thought up one planet and made all the action take place there. How many different planets does Keen visit per game?________________
[img]http://img.photobucket.com/albums/v462/lemur821/toughyorp.png[/img]
